name: Lurid
description:
You don't know where you've woken up, but there's a kind  stranger willing to help you out. You don't  remember who you are, but there are people willing to help you remember.

Their world is on the brink of crumbling, and you hold the key to stopping it-- will you help them out, too, or let the world fall to ruin?

IN DEVELOPMENT!  REVIEWS APPRECIATED!

UPDATES:

3/22/19: released!
